div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiijto
die mensis Nouembris anno quosupra

The said day the baillies assignit friday cum xv dais to thome
cowy in futy tile ansuer to the borght stekit on him be Williame'
murray in the name' ande behalf of Robert muray for the wrangwis'
withhalding fra the said Robert of half ane barrell of girsillis

The said day Johnne' Colly was inamerciament of the court
be ane suorne assis' Williame blinsele forspekar for the wrang
wis' strublance of alexander moresone and tile amend'
at law will and forber in tyme tocum and that was gevin for dome'
and the saide Alexander quyt of ale strublance of the said' Johne

add.foreign: prepositus et Auditores Compoti domini Johannis Ruthirfurd

div.p:
the saide day the aldirman balyeis and the Counsale and
communite being warnit be the hand' bell throw the
haile tone and Ane gret part of the Samyn gatherit and
present for the tyme Circualy Inquerit be officiar'
walde nocht consent to discharge the Auditoris chosin and Suorne
apone sere Jonhne Ruthirfurdis compt of thar aithis Ande grantit
ande consentit to pass' with alexander menyeis aldirman to complene to
the kingis hienes one the saide auditoris ande thai gaf nocht
thar' deliuerance of the said' compt or of the kingis cumin for
the frethin' of the towne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem'
xxvj die nouembris Anno quo supra

The saide day It was ordanit and deliuerit be the court
that Jonhne mvnk sal pay xx cartilfull of alding' to
Jonhne Colison'

The said day the baillies assignit mononday that
nixt cumis to thomas Riddaile tile ansuer to the borght
strekit one him be Symon' lip for the wrangwis' withalding
fra him of the waring of thre bollis of salt and the wra
ane suerd quhilk he left in his hous'

The saide day the Alderman and ballies assignit sunday'
the thrid day of december nixt tocum as day of peremptour'
to patrik lesly and Dauid tailyour procuratouris and forspekaris
for Jonet Westland and cristiane' Westland tile proceid and
minister Justice anent the gudis of airschip clamit be thaim
throue deceis' of vmquhile Johne' Westland and decernit
the copy of the deposicionis of the witnes to James
kennerty and malcome crag' in the name' of Jonet traile
and ordanit gilbert prestone' officiar to warne' the said'
Jonet to comper' the said day be hir self or hir procuratouris
to ansuer' peremptourly to the proveine' or thar procuratouris
in the premisse bringand witht sic Richtis as thai haue
and will wse becaus' this mater has bene diuers' tymes
in the law and vndecidit

The saide day the baillies chargit georg tailyeour
to pay to georg bisset xviij day schillingis be the law
day nixt eftir youle quhilk he grantit as borght for Johne
colly'

The said day It was deliuerit be ane assis' William
blinseile forspekar that Dauid Kintor sale deliuere to Johne'
of Ratre xij s' g' or a barrell of girlsillis quhilk ples'
the said' Dauid best

The said' day It was deliuerit be the said assis' that marion'
club sale deliuer to Dauid mar baillie iij s' of his mertimes maile
and gif scho prekis nocht one mononday that nixt cumis that scho has
pait him iiij s' in haile pament of vij s' of hes mertimes maile scho
sale pay him the said iiij s'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
penultimo die mensis Nouembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Alexander annand fecit constituit creauit
nominauit ordinauit duncanum collisoun' et Johannem
Ratre suos procuratores legitimos coniunctim et diuisum Dantes
ac Concedentes eisdem suam plenariam potestatem et mandatem
speciale ad prosequendum et calumpniandum thomam Riddaile
et certas alias personas pro vna barella bituminis ab eo detenta
Promittens de Rato et grato in weriorem forma procuratorij et cetera

The said day the baillies assignit friday that nixt cumis
to thomas riddaile to ansuer peremptourly to the borght strekit
one him be alexander annand and his procuratoris for the wrangwis'
Intrometting of ane barrell of ter pertening to him and decernit
the copy to be gevin of the said borght to the said thomas

The said day the court wardis schew for law and It was
geuin for dome' that mariore club had faylyet in hir preif
anent iiij s' pertening to dauid mar bailye for the quhilkis
scho was inamerciament of the court and aucht to pay the
said iiij s'

The said day the borght stekit be Symon lip one
thomas Riddaile for the wrangwis' withhalding fra him of
the waring of the bollis of gret salt and ane suerd is
fundin of waile for the quhilkis the said thomas was
in amerciament of the court and aucht to mak Rekning compt and
pament of the samyn to the said Symon'

The said day the borght stekit be William meldrum one Emy
potum the Relict of Johnne' potum for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra
him of ane stirk was fundin of nane' awaile for the quhilkis
he was in amerciament of the court and scho quit of his chalang

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirden' tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die
Decembris Anno quo supra

the said' day comperit ser William mureson' Curat of abirdene forspekar
for Jonhne Spens and askit at marion' burnat the relict of vmquhile
Dauy Spens the gudis of arschip and the chartiris pertening to him as
ayr' to the said' Dauy

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis with avis' of the court assignit
to patry leslie and Dauy talyour procuratoris and forspekaris tile for cristiane
Westlande and Jonet Westlande one that ane part Ande James
Kennertj and malcome of crag caucionaris and forspekaris for Jonet
traill one that vthir part friday eftir the law day next eftir yule
immediatlie eftir folloing' to comper befor tham within the tolbutht thar'
to follou defende and ansuer' perempturlie to the saide cristiane West
lande and Jonet Westlande and to thar procuratoris for the airschip of gudis
clamit be tham be deces' of vmquhile Johne Westlande and to bring
with tham sic Richtis as thai haue and wile us' in the premiss' with consent
of bath the said' partiis and thar' handis tharto vphaldin

The said' day Jonhne greg lauchfullie warnit callit and
nocht comperit til ansuer' to the borghe' stekit one him be
Androw litstar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of ix l' xix s'
and x d' be gud' estimacioun' for costis etc maid' and sustenit
in the present of ane pix of wade tharfor the aldirman ande
balyeis ordanit William scrimgeor officiar' to pas' and tak ane
distres of the saide Jonhniz and latt it Agane to the borghe'
and it be askit Ande warne him to comper this day
xv dais the xxij day of this instand monetht of December'
to ansuer to the said' borghe' as secunde day of process

The said' day the counsale and communite warnit be the hande
bell throw the hell tone Ande forgatherit maid' constitut
and ordanit Alexander menyeis Alexander chamer gilbert menyes James
Colison' thar' procuratoris coniunctlie and Seueralie with pouer' to substitut
ane or may to defend' the Summons maid' one the
haill tone for iiijxx li' clamit be thomas leslie Johne
mar' Richerd' ruthirfurd Richerd Waus and William Wormet
Ande to follou and persew ser Johne ruthirfurd' for the common'
gudis of the said' tone And' forthir tile ansuer' and defend'
follou and persew ale and Sindrie actionis caus' concerning the
hall tone and ordanit to make ane procuratory vndir
thar' common sele and to be Selit with thar said' common' sele

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit sonday nixt eftir the la
day to thome Ridall to ansuer perempturlie to the borghe fun
one him be Alexander annand' and his procuratoris for the wranguis' Intrometting
with ane barell of tar' of his

The said' Day the aldirman and balyeis assignit to the Curat forspekar
to Jonhne Spens friday eftir the law day for ministracion' of Justice
of Justice Anent the airschip clamit be the saide Jonhne be the
deces' of vmquhill Dauy Spens and ordanit marion' barrat
to ansuer' the saide day for the saide arschip and decernit the
Copy of that bill gevin In be the said' Curat to the saide marion'

add.foreign: propinacio domino gray Justiciario S domini nostri Regis

div.p:
The saide say the aldirman ballieis and consale present for the tyme ordanit
j pec' and demi of wax to be maide in torchis and prekatis and iij gallonis'
of wyne boystis of skorcheatis to be gevin in ane propin'
to the lorde gray Justice tile our Soueran lorde quhen he come to the
ayr' of abirdene fra the northt partis and ordanit gilbert menyeis and Androu
Cullane denys of the gilde to outred' the said' thingis of the common'
gudis of the said' burghe'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvjo
die mensis Decembris Anno quo supra

The said' day ser Jonhne ruthirfurd' warnit lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be Jonhne Colisone for the wrang
uys' withhaldin fra him of vj s' of ane cobill her' tharfor' the ballies
ordanit gilbert prestone officiar' to pas' and tak

head.add: pro cristina Smyth et cetera Inquisito mariore andirson'

div.p:
gilbertus menyeis Duncanus Colison thomas Waus matheus
branche Robertus crag Dauid murray patricius leslie Malcomus
Crag gavanus murray Johannes Arthouris Willelmus murray and
Johannes annand' burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam marioria
Andirson' mar cristiane smitht latriciss presencium Obiit vlt ad
parem et filem domini nostri Regis et cetera Et quod dicta cristina est legittima
et propinquor heres dicte quondam matris sue Et quod est legittime
etatis et qod non Obiit vestita et cetera de feodo aliquarum terrarum sine
annuorum Redditum

The said' day alexander scrogis Solempmtlie protestit that quhat was
done or happin to be done Anent the Sesin of his Inland' clamit
and follouit be Scrogis his Sone suld' turne him to nay
preiudice

The said' day comperit Dauid Colp ande producit our' Souerane
lordis lettres vndir the Signet to the aldirman ande balyeis chargeand
thame to minister Justice to the saide Dauy Anent the gudis et cetera gevin to him
be our' Souerane lorde pertening to his hienes be the deces' of vmquhill
Johne huchoson' as eschaet of bastardy as in the samyn mair' fullie Is
contenit quhilkis lettres being rede and vndirstanding the said' Dauy askit
at James Colison' and thomas lam vij' viijc skinnis and may skinnis and vthiris gudis
that he mycht persewe that Johne huchoson' hed' and left in his hous' in tym of his deces'
Ande the saide James Colison' being' present denyit that he hed' sic gudis or ony
gudis pertening' to vmquhill the saide Johne Ande the aldirman and balyeis assignit
the law day next eftir yule to the said' Dauy colp to preyve the gudis that the
saide Johne hed in his hous' in tym of his deces' of his avne that Justice mycht be done
equalie according' to our Soueran lettres
and gift maid' tharapon'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xvijo die mensis decembris anno quosupra

The said' day the baillies assignit the law day nixt eftir yonle to Dauid Kintor
yonle to ansuer peremptoiroly to the borght strekit one him
be Johne Arthour for the wrangwis' withhalding fra him of
ane franche crown'

the saide day Jonhne grig lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit to ansuer
to the borghe' strekit one him be Androw litstar for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of ix l' xix s' and x d' for costis maid' and Sustenit in the
persent of ane pip of wad' et cetera tharfor the balyeis ordanit William scrimgeour
officiar' to pas' and tak ane stres' of the saide Johnis' and lat It Agan to
borghe and It be askit Ande warne him to the law day next eftir
yule to ansuer' to the said' borghe' as thrid' day of process befor witnes

The said day Richerd litster grantit him awand' to ser Jhone
streueling vj s' viij d' and quhilkis the baillies chargit him
to pay within terme of law and allegeit that thomas gledstane and
his wif suld pay the tothir half merk for the Retouris maid to thame

The ferde day of Januar' the yer' of gode IM vc and ane yer'
Alexander menyeis aldirman Johne Cullan Androw Cullan James Colisone
Dauy mar' gilbert menyeis Androw murray William murray Alexander myrton'
William nicholson Androw litstar Johne murray gilbert litstar Robert murray gavin'
murray Johne blak alexander scrogis mathow branche Robert kintor malcum
Crag Dauy murray Dauy Kintor patry leslie William blinsele Johne
annand' Johne Steuinson patry Rede Johne Ratre thomas Waus
Androw Waus Robert crag William Kintor Duncan Crak alexander prat
Johne Auchneyve gilbert Reburn Johne Arthour Dauy fynne Richerd'
Was yongar Johne meldrum Dauy arrot Dauy tulidef Johne falconar
Richerde redhed' Dauy broys' Robert futhes alexander prat gilbert paterson'
Johne talyour thome menyes thome Narne Johne Porter Williame
philp Androw vody A' gordon' thome meldrum Johne chapman Androw
louson' Cristy prat Wat strachan thome lammynton' Johne litstar yongar
Johne horne James Kennertj William Ranison' thome Ridall henry
horn' Dauy adamsone Duncan Collison' Duncan porter Syme Robertson'
William scrimgeour laurence talyour Jonhne greg thome Watsone William
Walcar' Androw nachtj William blinsell couper gilbert preston thome sidlar'
Johne malisson' Alexander horne A' Jofrasone William coupar Duncan
Smyt William vmfray Johne chamer Donald' baxter Will smitht
Dauy talyour Johne Rede hatmakar patry Adamson' Robert talyour george

talyour Jonhne knollis Johne Colison' Richerde hill yongar Sandy li
mynton' Johne glenny Alexander mar' Androw ancroft Johne leslie of Warderis
Alexander chamer Alexander rede Alexander mathouson' William futhes Androw futhes Alexander
gray Androw michelson' William portar henry Alexander talyour Alexander Ranison'
Johne cromy Androw tuliboy William Rolland' Alexander malisson' Johne sclatar
thomas talyour William cristy William gray alexander lindssay Alexander Rolland'
and Robert Walcar'
